https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fc7DNLwt4ZTCSNQUbaLk9xLPQD4.jpg Step into the curio cabinet of an ambitious inventor who defies the laws of time, space and dimension in order to reinvent everything around him. Suddenly, the visible becomes invisible, perspectives are transformed, and the world is literally turned upside down. Immerse yourself in a spectacular cinematic experience through never-before-seen angles. Movie-going just got jaw-dropping! Cirque du Soleil: Kurios - Cabinet of Curiosities
